profile.description:
Software engineer with a path to being FullStack, passionate about the Front End, with experience developing with languages ​​such as JavaScript, JAVA, C#.
I characterize myself for being responsible in my activities and duties, following standards and adapting to teamwork and new projects. I am interested in researching new technologies or framework tools that allow me to be useful and learn for creation and development, to provide solutions that help improve business processes.
